DOC.detailed_description: This study track 600 young adult ( age 18 29 ) two-year period , collect variable gamble behavior , drug alcohol use , psychiatry medical history , family history , impulsivity , quality life , self-esteem , cognition . For individual meet criterion impulsive , randomize receive intervention help reduce impulsivity .
